description.en_US: Use it to attack the darkness.
description.de_DE: Benutz es, um die Dunkelheit anzugreifen.
description.ja_JP: 闇に対する攻撃として使われる。

description.en_US: Sends a marker that homes in on a target, dropping icicles along the way.
description.de_DE: Sends a marker that homes in on a target, dropping icicles along the way.
description.fr_FR: Sends a marker that homes in on a target, dropping icicles along the way.
description.zh_CN: Sends a marker that homes in on a target, dropping icicles along the way.
description.ko_KR: Sends a marker that homes in on a target, dropping icicles along the way.
description.ja_JP: Sends a marker that homes in on a target, dropping icicles along the way.

description.en_US: Sends a marker that homes in on a target before hurling a hefty icicle towards the marker.
description.de_DE: Sends a marker that homes in on a target before hurling a hefty icicle towards the marker.
description.fr_FR: Sends a marker that homes in on a target before hurling a hefty icicle towards the marker.

description.ja_JP: Sends a marker that homes in on a target before hurling a hefty icicle towards the marker.
